title: 2020 NBA MVP Odds: Back To Back Greek Freak
seoTitle: 2020 NBA MVP Odds: Back To Back Greek Freak...
body:
Your NBA MVP Odds 

Courtesy of our friends at Fanduel:

![fanduel nba mvp odds](/images/uploads/nba-mvp-odds.png "fanduel nba mvp odds")

Giannis is incredibly short odds, but he's arguably better value than LeBron at +400.
